lines.text: Joe, do you have any idea what's available to a woman of 33? Married men. Drunks. Pretty boys looking for someone to support them. Lunatics looking for their fifth divorce! It's quite a list, isn't it?
Go ahead, punch me in the nose!...
Why should I? You'd punch back!
I have a high IQ and a low boiling point.
The night is young and we're middle-aged. Anything could happen.
